Hero.introduce: Hi, I'm Wallop (‚ÄúChamp‚Äù) ‚Äî a frontend web developer at <synapes>Synapes</synapes> and CTO at Ezygroup Innovation. About.about: A web developer specialized in Next.js and Flutter for developing and assembling UI based on designs, delivering fast and responsive performance on both web and mobile applications. Experienced in using Docker for containerization and developing production-grade applications, with a comprehensive understanding of frontend, backend, and DevOps systems to deliver stable, maintainable, and efficient software.
